pkgmetadata.longdescription: burnCDDA is a console frontend to cdrdao, cdrecord, mpg123, oggdec, mppdec, flac, normalize, and mp3_check. It can be used to create audio CDs from an M3U playlist (the playlist format of XMMS and amaroK). It supports MP3, OGG Vorbis, Musepack, FLAC, and WAV files, and it might be the easiest way to copy an audio CD.
